sense.def:
An effect
je sprememba, odziv ali vtis, ki ga nekaj povzroči ali je posledica nečesa.

seg.quote: This has the effect of separating students from teachers.
...the effect of noise on people in the factories.
Don't move, or you'll destroy the whole effect.

sense.def:
To effect something
pomeni, da se nam posreči povzročiti, da se nekaj zgodi;

seg.quote: Production was halted until repairs could be effected.

sense.def:
To do something for effect
pomeni nekaj storiti zato, da bi na ljudi naredili vtis.

Izraz
in effect
dodamo trditvi, kadar hočemo pokazati, da ni čisto natančna, vendar primerno povzema položaj.

seg.quote: In effect he has no choice.

sense.def:
Izraze
to this effect
,
to that effect
ali
to the effect that
uporabljamo, kadar povzemamo tisto, kar je nekdo povedal, da nam ni treba ponavljati njegovih resničnih besed.

seg.quote: ...a rumour to the effect that he had been drunk.
He said, ‘No, you fool, the other way!’ or words to that effect.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
takes effect
ali
is put into effect
, se tisto začne dogajati.

seg.quote: The tax cuts take effect on July 1st.
Signing the agreement was one thing, putting it into effect was another.
